cmds.name: top
cmds.desc: Shows the experience leaderboard.

cmds.name: level
cmds.desc: Shows the level of a user.

cmds.name: urban
cmds.desc: Shows the definition of an expression.

cmds.name: dict
cmds.desc: Shows the definition of a word.

cmds.name: anime
cmds.desc: Shows information about an anime.

cmds.name: country
cmds.desc: Shows information about a country.

cmds.name: del
cmds.desc: Deletes all the messages in the range of  given message-ids.

cmds.name: ban
cmds.desc: Bans a member from the server.

cmds.name: kick
cmds.desc: Kicks a member from the server.

cmds.name: mute
cmds.desc: Mutes a member in the server.

cmds.name: sancinfo
cmds.desc: Gets information about a user's sanction.

cmds.name: remsanc
cmds.desc: Removes a user's sanction.

cmds.name: list
cmds.desc: Find all the users with a specific role.

cmds.name: searchin
cmds.desc: Find a user with a specific role.

cmds.name: Giveaway / Stopgiveaway
cmds.desc: Makes/Stops a giveaway in the current channel.

cmds.name: Remind / Stopreminder
cmds.desc: Adds/Stops a reminder. The bot will/won't remind you!

cmds.name: quote
cmds.desc: Quotes a message from this or the given channel.

cmds.name: color
cmds.desc: Shows a color.

cmds.name: exec
cmds.desc: Runs a script using Rextester.

cmds.name: meme
cmds.desc: Shows a random meme!

cmds.name: translate
cmds.desc: Translates a sentence.
